name: Itty Bitty Dungeon
description:
Ariel's mother was abducted by an Evil Wizard who locked her away in the top of his tower.

Ariel has traveled to his tower to defeat him and rescue her mother, but first she must defeat his minions and monsters before she can reach the top of the tower.

*****

Six levels of fantasy action platformer. Fight or evade the Evil Wizard's monsters and minions. Collect keys to advance to the next level. Open chests to find Healing Potions. Make it to the top of the tower and battle the Evil Wizard. Collect the final key to open the cell and win.

Controls and additional details on the Help screen.

Combat Hint: Ariel is only armed with a dagger, so you have to stick and move with her.

*****

Sticky Keys:  You can now use the Enter key to Attack as an alternative to using the Shift key.  The Enter key won't interact with Sticky Keys if you prefer to have it on.

If you want to turn Sticky Keys off (I personally find it very annoying), you can turn it off under your Settings/Ease of Access/Interaction/Keyboard/Use Sticky Keys.
